Package info.ponciano.lab.geotimewfs.models.semantic

Interface KnowledgeBaseInterface

All Known Implementing Classes:
KB, OntoManagement
public interface KnowledgeBaseInterface
Interface to manage knowledge.
Author:
Dr Jean-Jacques Ponciano Contact: jean-jacques@ponciano.info

  • Method Details

    • addPrefix

      void addPrefix​(String key, String namespace)
      Add prefix for every spaql query
      Parameters:
      key - kew use as prefix
      namespace - name space to be added. 
       Example for  xsd:type \n"
 addPrefix(xsd,http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#)

    • uplift

      boolean uplift​(String xml)
      Uplift Metadata from an XML file to the ontology
      Parameters:
      xml - the XML file path on the server.
      Returns:
      true if the elevation succeeded, false otherwise.

    • downlift

      String downlift​(String metadataURI) throws OntoManagementException
      Downlifts ontology metadata information as a string formatted in XML.
      Parameters:
      metadataURI - URI of the metadata in the ontology
      Returns:
      the XML String in iso-119115 format.
      Throws:
      OntoManagementException

    • change

      boolean change​(String ind, String property, String value)

    • getSPARQL

      String getSPARQL​(String query)
      Executes SPARQL select function and format the results in an String
      Parameters:
      query - select query
      Returns:
      query's results in String format.

    • construct

      boolean construct​(String queryString) throws OntoManagementException
      Execute the SPARQL construct query.
      Parameters:
      queryString - query to process.
      Returns:
      true if the execution was successful.
      Throws:
      OntoManagementException

    • select

      org.apache.jena.query.ResultSet select​(String queryString)
      Executes SPARQL select query.

      Example of use: 

      
   ResultSet select = this.select(query);
 List gts = new ArrayList(); while (select.hasNext()) {
 Resource resource = select.next().getResource(vcode); gts.add(resource);
 }
      Parameters:
      queryString - SPARQL query string.
      Returns:
      ResultSet obtained from the query selection.

    • update

      void update​(String query) throws OntoManagementException
      Execute a update query on the data set
      Parameters:
      query - query to be executed
      Throws:
      OntoManagementException - if something is wrong

    • queryAsArray

      List<String[]> queryAsArray​(String query, String[] var, boolean fullURI, boolean onlyNS)
      Function that executes a SPARQL query and return the result as a list of String table
      Parameters:
      query - contains the SPARQL query to execute
      var - contains the different variables of the SPARQL query, whose the result will be returned
      fullURI - : if fullURI is true, returns the full URI of the resources, else returns the local name of the resources
      onlyNS - : if onlyNS is true, it does not return results with external name space, else returns all results
      Returns:
      a list of string table containing each result row for the seta of variables

    • dataImport

      void dataImport​(String mduri, String ttlpath)
      Function to import a data associated to its metadata into the knowledge base
      Parameters:
      mduri - : URI of the metadata linked to the data to import
      ttlpath - : data content represented through triples

    • getOnt

      info.ponciano.lab.pisemantic.PiOnt getOnt()
      Returns:
      the OntModel of the knowledge base
